items.sentence: How many animal species are there in the world?
You'd better chain up the dog so he won't bite.
Tom is always having trouble with his computer.
I wonder whether Tom is studying French or not.
I bought this book at the university bookstore.
Tom said that he didn't want to waste his time.
Isn't it true only boys are allowed to do that?
I think that what happened was a little unfair.
Tom told me that he didn't want that to happen.
That wasn't the only thing that I wanted to do.
